content: *enjoy this warm afghan in subtle earth-tones lion brand yarn * lion brand pattern # 40539 *chs-ripplethrow pdf* published in knit n style knit it skill level easy level 2 homespun® article #790 3 colors 2 balls each 6 balls total *antique prairie mediterranean* crochet hook - size n-13 9 mm gauge 17 stitches one pattern repeat + 12 row = 6 inches 15 cm in pattern pattern 1-row repeat in single_crochet special stitch decrease single_crochet decrease work 3 row of each color to desired length fasten_off and weave in ends to finish
